title: Confessions of a Heretic: How a Right Wing, Fundamentalist, Conservative Pastor Became a Leftist, Liberal Heathen
description: The true story of a conservative Christian Pastor who began to question the religious dogmas of his youth and the changes which came as a result of his questioning. Also included is an examination of many Christian doctrines and the problems the author developed with those doctrines.
author: Brent McCay
